Name:       Oxygen
Homepage:   https://projects.kde.org/projects/playground/artwork/oxygen-fonts/repository
Download:   http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/oxygen
Version:    0.4
License:    Open Font License 1.1
Publisher:  KDE
Designer:   Vernon Adams
Designed:   2011
Derivation: none

Oxygen was designed for the Oxygen Project to give a visual refresh to
the KDE Plasma Workspaces.
